issue.title: [build cop] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsTest.SpawnDrop/1 Tests fail with bullet 2.81 or single precision

content.raw:
Many of the tests failing in 2015 were fixed by pull request #1976, pull request #1997, and pull request #2047 but are now seen again since we switched to using single precision bullet on homebrew:

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/236/files#diff-6d409bd97e4fb94edd923980185e2731R33
* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/237/files#diff-e93c7971ca370bbb0777330f413b81dbR39
content.html:
Many of the tests failing in 2015 were fixed by pull request #1976, pull request #1997, and pull request #2047 but are now seen again since we switched to using single precision bullet on homebrew:

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/236/files#diff-6d409bd97e4fb94edd923980185e2731R33
